typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		F5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisaation
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Avoir
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		fact_filter as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Facturation
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtarctionSAP
source(output(
		{Cl� R�f�rentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Cl� EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal d�but} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{D�partement} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> REFATC
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
selectAvoir, organisaation join(selectAvoir@HubSAPid == organisaation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Facturation, organisaation join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 filter(toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+"0"+Mois  )) ~> typeCast
Select1 derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45,     iif(canal=="FS", 51,     iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		tOrigin = "avoir") ~> mapCanalID
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Récept. de march.},
		reference = Article,
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		tOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> efacturation
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inner
Join2 derive(month = right(yearmonth, 2),
		tOrigin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn1
mapCanalID, efacturation join({Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year),
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRight
typeCast select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = selectAvoir@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeft filter(isNull(efacturation@tOrigin)) ~> left
left derive(data_origin = "avoir",
		id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		POSSAMidString = NoCli,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = Select1@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
fullRight filter(isNull(mapCanalID@tOrigin)) ~> right
right select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference = efacturation@reference,
		yearmonth = efacturation@yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = efacturation@HubSAPid,
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		ca_final = {CA facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(data_origin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn3
inner select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = Select1@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid),
	ca_final = first(ca_final),
		NoOffre = max(NoOffre),
		qt_final = max(qt_final),
		canal = max(canal),
		id_canal_final = max(id_canal_final),
		{ATC Corrigé} = max({ATC Corrigé}),
		marque_id = max(marque_id),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		{Donneur d ordre} = max({Donneur d ordre})) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endInner
Aggregate1 derive(data_origin = "facturation avoir") ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
Select2 select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		qt_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		ca_final,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
DerivedColumn5, endRight union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5, endLeft union(byName: true)~> Union2
Select6 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDerementaiton
endInner derive(id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn5
Union2 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
organisaation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SVanMarkes.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieVanMarkes
